definitions: in a way that shows an excessive desire or appetite for food

examples.text: we greedily devoured the hors d'oeuvres

shortDefinitions: in way that shows excessive desire or appetite for food

definitions: with an intense and selfish desire for wealth or power

examples.text: bureaucrats are greedily eyeing the organization's rich portfolio of property

shortDefinitions: with intense and selfish desire for wealth or power
